_metadata.description: Requirements registry for ROI Fit Analysis - financial decision-making and market intelligence

requirements.title: Market intelligence gathering via web research
requirements.description: Scrape and analyze current market data, competitor pricing, and industry trends using browserless integration.

requirements.title: Skills assessment and opportunity matching
requirements.description: Match opportunities to user expertise and capabilities with confidence scoring algorithms.

requirements.title: Resource optimization analysis
requirements.description: Identify most efficient use of capital, time, and human resources across opportunities.

requirements.title: Risk quantification and probability assessment
requirements.description: Calculate risk-weighted returns with probability assessments and mitigation strategies.

requirements.title: Opportunity ranking by ROI potential
requirements.description: Rank opportunities by ROI potential with detailed justifications and supporting data.

requirements.title: RESTful API for analysis workflows
requirements.description: Core endpoints for submitting opportunities, retrieving analyses, and exporting reports.

requirements.title: CLI interface for batch analysis
requirements.description: Command-line tools for batch analysis and automation workflows.

requirements.title: Data visualization dashboard
requirements.description: Interactive charts, tables, and executive summaries in web UI with React/Vite.

requirements.title: Real-time market monitoring
requirements.description: Continuous tracking of market changes and competitive movements for tracked opportunities.

requirements.title: Advanced financial modeling
requirements.description: ROI calculations with multiple scenarios and sensitivity analysis capabilities.

requirements.title: Comparative opportunity analysis
requirements.description: Side-by-side comparison of multiple opportunities with scoring matrix.

requirements.title: Historical trend analysis
requirements.description: Track opportunity performance over time with pattern recognition algorithms.

requirements.title: Report export functionality
requirements.description: Generate PDF/Excel reports for presentations and stakeholder sharing.

requirements.title: Integration with data-tools scenario
requirements.description: Leverage data-tools for advanced analytics, transformations, and statistical analysis.
